default.source:
Custom fireplaces, made for your space

Tell us a bit about your project and how we can reach you. We‚Äôll follow up with ideas, sizing suggestions, and next steps for your fireplace.

Send your fireplace idea

A short note is enough to start ‚Äî you can always share more details later.

‚ûï Email us directly
Perfect if you want to add photos, sketches, or a longer story about your fireplace.

Why choose our limestone fireplaces?

A few reasons our clients pick limestone fireplaces for their homes.

üî•

A showpiece everyone notices

Your family will love it, and guests might even get a little jealous. It becomes the warm heart of your home.

ü™∂

Lightweight

The foam-core base keeps it light, while the limestone coating gives it the strength of real stone. Ideal for any wall or upper floor.

‚è≥

Made to last

Our limestone mix is polished and finished by hand for a timeless surface that keeps its beauty for decades.

üß±

Architect-grade materials

We use high-end limestone blends chosen by designers and builders for durability, texture, and long-term stability.

Frequently asked questions

A few common questions clients ask before they choose a limestone fireplace from us.

How is your fireplace different from a solid stone one? +
Our surrounds use a structural EPS core with a cast limestone shell. You get the look and feel of real stone, but at a fraction of the weight. That means easier installation, lower transport costs, and less stress on your walls and floors.
Is it strong enough if it‚Äôs not solid stone? +
Yes. The outer layer is real cast limestone, and the EPS core is dense and rigid, not hollow. The material is non-combustible and engineered to meet building standards. You get a durable surround that feels solid, without the downsides of a one-ton stone structure.
How heavy is it and how hard is installation? +
A typical solid stone fireplace can weigh close to 2,000 lbs and may require structural work. Our surrounds are usually in the 400‚Äì450 lbs range, so they can be installed with a small crew in about a day. In most homes there‚Äôs no need for cranes, special reinforcement, or a messy, weeks-long remodel.
Can you customize the size and design? +
Yes. Every fireplace is made to order on our own production line in Illinois. We can adjust width, height, projection, profiles, and limestone tint to match your room and firebox. Designers and architects often send us drawings or inspiration photos, and we build from there.
Where are your fireplaces made? +
Everything is manufactured in our factory in Batavia, just outside Chicago. The team has been making cast-limestone fireplaces for more than 30 years. Each surround is hand-finished and checked before it leaves the shop.
How long does production take? +
Production usually takes up to two weeks once the design is approved. Around busy seasons the schedule fills up quickly, so it‚Äôs best to reserve a spot early.
Do you also handle installation? +
We are a manufacturer, so we do not install fireplaces ourselves. But over the years we‚Äôve built a network of trusted installers and contractors we can connect you with. They quote installation directly, and we coordinate with them on measurements so everything goes smoothly.
Is tax included in the fireplace price? +
For residential clients in Illinois, the final fireplace amount is subject to an additional 8% sales tax on top of the fireplace price you receive from us. Installation is always invoiced separately by your installer or contractor.
Is this just about the look, or does it change how the home feels? +
Our clients aren‚Äôt just buying a surround ‚Äî they‚Äôre buying the atmosphere around it. A limestone fireplace becomes the place where family gathers on cold evenings, where you unwind with a book or a glass of wine, and the detail guests notice first. It‚Äôs comfort, warmth, and a quiet sense of pride in how your home looks and feels.

‚ùÑ ‚ú¥ ‚ùÖ ‚ùÑ ‚ú¥ ‚ùÖ
üå≤ HOLIDAY OFFER

10% OFF All Fireplace Orders

Fireplace demand rises fast before Christmas. This season we‚Äôre offering a limited 10% Holiday Discount on all custom fireplace orders. Reserve your spot now to ensure Christmas-ready installation.

  • ‚úî 10% off any custom fireplace
  • ‚úî Limited holiday availability
  • ‚úî Guaranteed spot before the rush
Claim 10% Holiday Discount
Get a quote

A fireplace isn‚Äôt just d√©cor ‚Äî it becomes the heart of the home.

Contact us

Crafted locally in Batavia, IL since 1993 ‚Äî proudly serving our local community.

Fireplace Types

There are many more categories than shown here. For inspiration, search ‚ÄúLimestone Fireplace‚Äù on Pinterest.

How your fireplace comes to life?

From first measurements to finished limestone pieces ‚Äî here‚Äôs what the process looks like.

Step 1

Send measurements

Share the size of your fireplace or firebox along with any ideas or inspiration from Pinterest.

Step 2

Draft design

We create a simple design based on your dimensions and help choose the right limestone color.

Step 3

Design approval and deposit

You review the design, sign the approval form and place a 50 percent deposit.

Step 4

Full-size foam mockup

After the deposit, we cut a one-to-one foam model and place it on your wall so you can see the exact shape and make any final adjustments.

Step 5

Production and pickup

Once the foam mockup is approved, we cut and cast your limestone pieces. Pickup is available in Batavia or we can arrange delivery. Installation is not included, but we can connect you with trusted installers.
